reviewText: For us who remember this wonderful man, what can i say but, he is still the best to watch.  Slapstick is so funny,,,there is no violence or cussing or sex,,,just an exceptionally talented man who could make anyone and everyone laugh.  His characters are a great work of imagination !!  This is real tv and comedy at its best.  Yeah its old,,,but it sure is a breath of fresh air from what is going on today.  Try it,,,you will love it.
Title: Red Skelton: America's Favorite Funnyman

reviewText: But slightly disappointed in the selection of the character vignettes chosen for this 2-disc edition.  Not great quality of film either. But I guess I can't complain - price was right.
summary: Loved Red Skelton as a child
Title: Red Skelton: America's Favorite Funnyman

reviewText: I always love Red Skelton, like to grab up any Red dvd's I can find! The price wasn't bad either.
Title: Red Skelton: America's Favorite Funnyman

reviewText: Skelton was a funny man. The selections used on this set are not his best. But it does give you an idea about this funny guy.
Title: Red Skelton: America's Favorite Funnyman

reviewText: all his shows where fun to watch most anyone in there 50s remembers him on TV..love the old classics shows like this..

reviewText: i purchased this set for my 30 year old son who named his new puppy earl cadidlehopper. He new who Red was from his childhood, but his kids and wife didn't so they needed educated. He loves them.

reviewText: This was a gift for a friend who is a Red Skelton fan.  I cann't review it more than that.
